rooms.name: Living Area & Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: A spacious combined living and open-plan kitchen area featuring Art Deco elements such as geometric patterns and streamlined furniture design. The space is oriented to capture natural light with large windows facing the courtyard and east for morning sunlight.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A luxurious master bedroom designed with Art Deco influences including elegant wall panels and decorative accents. The bed is positioned to allow clear views of the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom following the Art Deco style with modern finishes and accent lighting. The room is oriented to maximize natural light while adhering to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A well-proportioned bedroom designed in the Art Deco theme with geometric patterns and streamlined fixtures. The room is aligned according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact guest bathroom featuring Art Deco styled fixtures and modern amenities. Designed with Vastu in mind to maintain balance.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: An outdoor swimming pool area integrated with the central courtyard. The design includes decorative pool surrounds and is situated to enhance the aesthetic appeal while adhering to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A central open courtyard that serves as a focal point of the design. It features landscaped areas, seating arrangements, and pathways designed to promote natural ventilation and light according to Vastu.
